USE [SOCCERSERVERLESS];
GO

-- Goals per time bin per country/league

-- We could do time-based analysis as well, e.g. by observing the total number of
-- goals over the course of a game (0-90+ minutes), across all games in the five
-- leagues. We could use the “time_bin” column created as part of the transformation
-- process earlier, rather than a continuous variable like “time”.

-- Line chart
--      Keys: TIME_BIN
--      Values: TOT_GOALS
--      Series groupings: COUNTRY_CODE
--      Aggregation: String: Sum

SELECT COUNTRY_CODE, TIME_BIN, COUNT(1) TOT_GOALS
  FROM
    [ext].[GameEvents]
 WHERE is_goal = 1
 GROUP BY COUNTRY_CODE, TIME_BIN
 ORDER BY COUNTRY_CODE, TIME_BIN
